title: I Love Lucy
brief_description: Cuban Bandleader Ricky Ricardo would be happy if his wife Lucy would just be a housewife. Instead she tries to perform at the Tropicana where he works, and make life comically frantic at home.

constellations_other.name: Princesses, rom-coms and sit-coms
constellations_other.description: Newsreel footage was captured on large, bulky 35mm cameras like the Mitchell Newsreel Camera by operators in the field, but they were also used by film production companies and on TV shows, with some of those involved going on to define different genres.

constellations_other.name: Kylie to Lucy
constellations_other.description: 'Did It Again' started the conversation about Kylie Minogue being more than just a pop star, it started to cement her status as one of the most important audio and visual artists of her time, but the video had an unlikely inspiration.

constellations_other.name: 1950s television
constellations_other.description: "Good evening ... and welcome to television." Bruce Gyngell’s famous words launched television in Australia in 1956 on Sydney’s TCN9, with the medium finally arriving in the country towards the later end of the decade.
